title: CommonWireframe
description: Schema of common properties for Wireframe events type.

id.description: Defines the unique ID of the wireframe. This should be persistent throughout the view lifetime.

x.description: The position in pixels on X axis of the UI element in absolute coordinates. The anchor point will always be the top-left corner of the wireframe.

y.description: The position in pixels on Y axis of the UI element in absolute coordinates. The anchor point will always be the top-left corner of the wireframe.

width.description: The width in pixels of the UI element normalised based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2 the width of all UI elements will be divided by 2 to get a normalised width.

height.description: The height in pixels of the UI element normalised based on the device pixels per inch density (DPI). Example: if a device has a DPI = 2 the height of all UI elements will be divided by 2 to get a normalised height.
